entries.property: While attuned to the artifact, you have disadvantage on any ability check or saving throw that uses Strength or Constitution.
While attuned to the artifact, you have disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.
While attuned to the artifact, you have vulnerability to Poison damage.
While attuned to the artifact, you have the Blinded condition when you're more than 10 feet away from it.
While attuned to the artifact, you have the Deafened condition when you're more than 10 feet away from it.
While attuned to the artifact, you lose all sense of smell.
While you're attuned to the artifact, your appearance changes as the DM decides.
While attuned to the artifact, you emit a sour stench noticeable from up to 10 feet away.
When you touch a nonmagical gem or art object while attuned to the artifact, its value is reduced by half; this affects each object only once.
While you're attuned to the artifact, all Holy Water within 10 feet of you is destroyed.
While you're attuned to the artifact, nonmagical flames are extinguished within 30 feet of you.
While you're attuned to the artifact, other creatures can't take Short or Long Rests within 300 feet of you.
While attuned to the artifact, you kill any nonmagical vegetation you touch that isn't a creature.
While you're attuned to the artifact, Beasts within 30 feet of you that have a Challenge Rating of 6 or lower are hostile toward you.
